newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico stocks at record close on foreign buyers.
newsitem.headline: Mexico stocks at record close on foreign buyers.

text.p: Mexican stocks notched up their sixth record close after a recovery from last week's slump on Wall brought back foreign buyers, traders said.
Local and foreign dealers also bought ahead of expected falls in primary rates at Tuesday night's primary auction, they added. Preliminary figures showed the leading IPC share index
was up 9.81 points, or 0.25 percent, at a record close of 3,889.85. Trading volume was moderate at 72.5 million shares.
